mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EZ_KCM_PLEDGE_BANK ( PL_IDX, PL_WIWID1, PL_WIWID2, CATE_CONT, SUB_CONT, TEL_CONT, EMAIL_CONT, CLOB_CONT, REG_TYPE, REG_ID, REG_IP, REG_NAME, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{plIdx}, #{plWiwId1}, #{plWiwId2}, #{cateCont}, #{subCont}, #{telCont}, #{emailCont}, #{clobCont}, 'admin', #{regId}, #{regIp}, #{regName}, SYSDATE )

mapper.select: SELECT PL_IDX , SUB_CONT , TEL_CONT , EMAIL_CONT , CLOB_CONT , REG_ID , REG_NAME , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT , COUNT_CONT , RECOMMEND_CONT , CASE REG_TYPE WHEN 'admin' THEN '관리자 등록' WHEN 'naver' THEN '비회원(네이버)' WHEN 'kakao' THEN '비회원(카카오)' WHEN 'phone' THEN '비회원(휴대폰)' WHEN 'ipin' THEN '비회원(아이핀)' WHEN 'member' THEN '회원' END AS REG_TYPE , CATE_CONT , PL_WIWID1 , PL_WIWID2 , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM EZ_CMM_CODE WHERE CODE=CATE_CONT) AS CATE_CONT_TXT , (SELECT WIWNAME FROM EZ_KCM_WIWON_MST WHERE WIWID=PL_WIWID1) AS PL_WIW_TXT1 , CASE PL_WIWID2 WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE (SELECT WIWNAME FROM EZ_KCM_WIWON_MST WHERE WIWID=PL_WIWID2) END AS PL_WIW_TXT2 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EZ_KCM_PLEDGE_BANK_FILE WHERE PL_IDX=A.PL_IDX AND USE_YN='Y') AS FILE_CNT FROM EZ_KCM_PLEDGE_BANK A WHERE PL_IDX=#{plIdx}

SELECT PL_IDX , SUB_CONT , TEL_CONT , EMAIL_CONT , REG_TYPE , REG_ID , REG_NAME , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT , COUNT_CONT , RECOMMEND_CONT , CATE_CONT_TXT , PL_WIW_TXT1 , PL_WIW_TXT2 , FILE_CNT FROM ( SELECT PL_IDX , SUB_CONT , TEL_CONT , EMAIL_CONT , REG_TYPE , REG_ID , REG_NAME , REG_DT , COUNT_CONT , RECOMMEND_CONT , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM EZ_CMM_CODE WHERE CODE=A.CATE_CONT) AS CATE_CONT_TXT , (SELECT WIWNAME FROM EZ_KCM_WIWON_MST WHERE WIWID=A.PL_WIWID1) AS PL_WIW_TXT1 , CASE WHEN A.PL_WIWID2!=0 THEN (SELECT WIWNAME FROM EZ_KCM_WIWON_MST WHERE WIWID=A.PL_WIWID2) ELSE '-' END AS PL_WIW_TXT2 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EZ_KCM_PLEDGE_BANK_FILE WHERE PL_IDX=A.PL_IDX AND USE_YN='Y') AS FILE_CNT FROM EZ_KCM_PLEDGE_BANK A WHERE PL_DEL_YN='N'
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
ORDER BY RECOMMEND_CONT DESC
ORDER BY COUNT_CONT DESC
)
